name: Super Kong Adventure Run Pro
description:
Run, jump and slash your way through a vast world of platforming challenges and embark on an epic adventure! The #1 mobile adventure game and a 2D platformer. This is an exciting and addicting game at the same time. A thrilling ride through jungle, caves, and treetops.

>>Its Ads Free Version - No Internet Connection Needed<<

Best action adventure game on your iPhone & iPad! It's free!
Exciting & fun based adventure. Fly from platform to platform, watch out for dangers lurking in the jungle.

A GREAT ADVENTURE
• Explore a magical realm of dungeons, towns, treasures and devious monsters.
• Find powerful weapons, items, and spells to defeat your enemies.
• Venture into gloomy caves and dungeons to discover powerfully hidden swords.
• Gain experience and level up your character.

Features:
- Its Ads Free Version - No Internet Connection Needed
- Beautiful cartoon & hand drawn like graphics.
- Fun physics based gameplay
- Make your run through various landscapes (temple ruins, waterfalls, and jungles)
- Collect fruits like bananas, oranges, and chilis
- iPhone 5 widescreen support
- Retina Display support

Download now and experience the joy of flying, jumping, running and slashing the dangerous enemies, monsters, through various environments to WIN!
